text: hsbc s plc  - changes to board and committee composition
hsbc - appointment of steven guggenheimer as an independent non-executive director
hsbc - kathleen louise casey does not intend to seek re-election to board at company's annual general meeting on 24 april 2020

hsbc -  appointment will take effect from 1 may 2020
